name: Amsterdam Worldwide
description: We create cultural connections for brands. That means we make the film that comes after the pre-roll. The article in the middle of the banners. The stories people share with joy. We create a natural desire to watch, read and engage. We offer a range of services from brand strategy, brand content, marketing innovation, digital content production & creation, from TV commercials to short-films, books and events, design, to digital design and web development services.
